sentences.en: Individuals who have repressive personality trait are called repressors, and others are called non - repressors.
sentences.cn: 压抑人格是一种同时具有低特质焦虑和高防御两个特征的人格类型.

sentences.en: Thailand was once an outpost of freedom in a fairly repressive region.
sentences.cn: 在周围地区相对保守封闭的环境中,泰国曾是自由的前哨.

sentences.en: The BI is the opposite of this, neither stigmatizing nor repressive.
sentences.cn: 基本收入与此相反, 既不会无价值,也不残暴.

sentences.en: This is to promote enterprise development and survival of enterprises of the repressive proposition.
sentences.cn: 这是促进企业发展与拖垮企业的生死命题的思考.

words.tran_cn: 重压；补加压力；[机] 再压
抑制，[心理] 压抑；镇压
抑制；镇压；约束（repress的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: not allowing the expression of feelings or desires, especially sexual ones
